alert.note: Alert for Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:19PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Valley and northwestern Sherman Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arcadia, or 18 miles southwest of Ord, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcadia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
